description:
Not only does Marik’s Helpoemer send Jonouchi’s powerful cards to the graveyard before Jonouchi can use them, but Jonouchi also receives damage for every monster that goes to the graveyard!  Running low on cards and life points, Jonouchi’s opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retour au royaume des ombres - 2e partie
地獄の詩人 ヘルポエマー
